title: Runaway Reptar
description: Dactar, the pterodactyl, hatches from the egg found at the La Brea Tar Pits and inexplicably finds his way to Tokyo to destroy beach front property. And Reptar joins him!
quote: How can this be? Reptar has always been our friend!
altHero: Reptar, a giant t-rex, walks in a harbor toward the city
alt1: Dactar the pterodactyl on strings knocks a building over
alt2: three scientists look out a big window with binoculars
alt4: Reptar and Dactar destroy a roller coaster
